item.name: Home
item.description: We met when I was little, maybe 3 or 4 years old, I can’t remember. It was inside this big brick building, lots of colorful windows, endless rows of brown benches. It smelled like dust and old people — which wasn’t surprising since it was filled with dust and old people. I remember that there was a […]
